articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Sensex falls 300 points, Nifty near 18,200 on weak global cues - The Economic Times
articles.description: In the Sensex pack, L&T, Tata Steel, Asian Paints, and HCL Tech were the top laggards, falling over 1% each in early trade. NTPC, Infosys, Reliance, and Tech Mahindra also opened with losses. Whereas, M&M, Tata Motors, Maruti, and Titan opened with gains.
articles.content: Indian equity markets opened in the red on Friday, tracking a slide in global peers, as data hinted at a slowdown in the US economy. Meanwhile, investors back home awaited retail inflation data.The B… [+2449 chars]
